title: Subject
description: Encodes basic information about any experimental subject organism

id.description: A string uniquely identifying this subject

collection.description: A CV term describing the top-level collection containing this subject (e.g. HMP, NeMO, HMBR, etc.)

NCBI_taxonomy_ID.description: The numeric ID of a NCBI Taxonomy Database entry describing a clade to which this subject belongs

comment.description: A generic placeholder for any text comments accompanying this subject

processed_by.description: An array of IDs of events that processed this subject

part_of_study.description: An array of IDs of all studies and sub-projects to which this subject belongs (EXCLUDING the top-level dataset already described by this subject's 'collection' property)

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make this subject 'taggable'

_search.description: An object containing additional (unstructured) data to enhance searching
